name: @elpete/gitlab-npm-audit-parser
description: NPM Audit parser for GitLab dependency scanning

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: export npm_config_loglevel=silent; npm run test:v1; npm run test:v2; npm run test:run-script-use;
scripts.test:v1: printf 'v1: '; cat test/v1_report.json | ./dist/parse.js -o GL-report.1.json >/dev/null && diff -q GL-report.1.json test/snapshot/GL-report.1.json && echo success!; RC=$?; rm GL-report.1.json; exit $RC
scripts.test:v2: printf 'v2: '; cat test/v2_report.json | ./dist/parse.js -o GL-report.2.json >/dev/null && diff -q GL-report.2.json test/snapshot/GL-report.2.json && echo success!; RC=$?; rm GL-report.2.json; exit $RC
scripts.test:run-script-use:
printf 'run-script-use: '; bash -c 'cat <(echo -e "
> npm audit --json
") test/v2_report.json' | ./dist/parse.js -o GL-report.runs.json >/dev/null && diff -q GL-report.runs.json test/snapshot/GL-report.2.json && echo success!; RC=$?; rm GL-report.runs.json; exit $RC

author: Maxime Gibeau
